title: Binary Watch Face For Geeks!
summary: A Binary Watch face for your inner Geek!.
description: A Binary watch face for you Android Wear device!The companion app that installs on your handset with the watch face allows you to configure the colors on the watch face. Choose from a wide array of colors to give you a face style that suits you.Learn how to read time in binary and impress your friends with your awesomeness!There is a picture explaining how to read the time in the screenshots below and inside the application.Unleash your inner geek by  giving it a try! Earn a bazillion Geek Points just by downloading it!Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
A Binary watch face for you Android Wear device!
The companion app that installs on your handset with the watch face allows you to configure the colors on the watch face. Choose from a wide array of colors to give you a face style that suits you.
Learn how to read time in binary and impress your friends with your awesomeness!
There is a picture explaining how to read the time in the screenshots below and inside the application.

Unleash your inner geek by giving it a try! Earn a bazillion Geek Points just by downloading it!

Enjoy!
comments: Look is great. Time is wrong! My phone time is correct and the watch is always wrong (yes, I confirmed I'm trading it correctly). Sorry, uninstalling.

Looks better than all the other ones, just two options away from being perfect. Would love of we had the option to change from 24 to 12 hour display, and the option to disable the seconds columns, great work on the app!
Great... Only problem, if i change the mode ( hor/ver) it doesnt change instantly
Great job Works well thanks. Maybe add some more customisations, dot size, spacing ,etc.
How do you change the time? It keeps showing the wrong time.
Awesome Just what I wanted. Please make options for dimmed screen so the time etc doesn't show.
recentChanges: + You can change the mode for your watch!, give it a try to the horizontal mode, it may the best for you.
